channel.title: MYB
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MYB, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: iOS 18.5: Apple’s New iPhone Release Has Key Fixes And Critical Update Warning
item.description: The next iPhone update is one of the last major releases in the iOS 18 cycle. It’s just launched and is ready to download.

item.title: Apple iOS 18.5 New iPhone Software: Should You Upgrade?
item.description: One of the last iPhone updates for iOS 18 has just landed — here are full details of whether or not you should install it pronto.
